content: Requirements Management: Capture, manage, and organize software requirements effectively.
Traceability Matrix: Generate a matrix to trace requirements, test cases, and code artifacts.
Change Impact Analysis: Analyze and visualize the impact of requirement changes.
Version Control Integration: Link requirements to versioned code in repositories.
Automated Reporting: Create detailed reports on traceability and coverage with one click.
Collaboration Tools: Enable team collaboration through comments, notifications, and reviews.
